requiredDocumentsList.name: certificate_of_incorporation
requiredDocumentsList.label: Certificate Of Incorporation
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: Written evidence relating to the company formation that reflects the registration information

requiredDocumentsList.name: articles_of_association
requiredDocumentsList.label: Articles Of Association
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: A document that defines the company purpose and sets out the rules in which a company must be run and administered

requiredDocumentsList.name: directors_register
requiredDocumentsList.label: Directors Register
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: This pertains to a list of the directors elected by the firm. *Please submit a document that was issued in the last 12 months

requiredDocumentsList.name: shareholder_register
requiredDocumentsList.label: Shareholder Register
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: This document requires that every current shareholder is recorded. *Please submit a document that was issued in the last 12 months

requiredDocumentsList.name: aml_policies_procedures
requiredDocumentsList.label: Aml Policies Procedures
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: Anti-money laundering (AML) refers to the laws, regulations and procedures intended to prevent criminals from disguising illegally obtained funds as legitimate income. These policies can include areas such as customer due diligence, monitoring and controls. *Please submit the most recent version of your AML policies

requiredDocumentsList.name: financial_statement
requiredDocumentsList.label: Financial Statement
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: This document is a formal record of the financial activities of a company. *Please submit a document that was issued in the last 12 months

requiredDocumentsList.name: client_list
requiredDocumentsList.label: Client List
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: This requirement is to check if the merchant is doing PEP and sanction screening of players; and what the tool/software they use to do this process. *Please submit a list of newly-boarded customers/players in the last 2 months. An onboarding specialist will get back to you with 3 randomly-selected names

requiredDocumentsList.name: wolfsburg_questionnaire
requiredDocumentsList.label: Wolfsburg Questionnaire
requiredDocumentsList.toolTip: This questionnaire established by The Wolfsberg Group airms to provide a standardised overview of a financial institution's AML policies and practices. *The template of the questionnaire may be found here: https://www.wolfsberg-principles.com/sites/default/files/wb/FCCQ_V1.1_SC04_.pdf
